title: FEMALE DR. POURS DRANO in Hubby's Drink
itunes:title: FEMALE DR. POURS DRANO in Hubby's Drink
description:
A California dermatologist is accused of allegedly poisoning her doctor husband with drain cleaner. 

Dr. Yue “Emily” Yu was arrested after Chen apparently caught Yu on a nanny cam video putting Drano in his lemonade. Chen accuses his wife of having a long history of mistreating him and their two children. 

Joining Nancy Grace Today:

  • Matthew Mangino - Attorney, Former District Attorney (Lawrence County), Former Parole Board Member, Author: "The Executioner's Toll: The Crimes, Arrests, Trials, Appeals, Last Meals, Final Words and Executions of 46 Persons in the United States", MattMangino.com, Twitter: @MatthewTMangino 
  • Caryn Stark - NYC Psychologist, CarynStark.com, Twitter: @carynpsych, Facebook: "Caryn Stark"  
  • Mona Kay - Private Investigator, "Mona K Investigations" (Omaha, NE), Twitter: @monakay
  • Dr. William Morrone - Chief Medical Examiner, Bay County Michigan, Author: "American Narcan: Naloxone & Heroin-Fentanyl Associated Mortality", RecoveryPathwaysLLC.com 
  • Nathan Percy - Crime and Public Safety Reporter, Southern California News Group, OCRegister.com, Twitter: @NDPercy

 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
